summary: Completed comprehensive testing of mobile-only UI fixes for GuessIt Football Prediction Platform. All three major fixes working correctly: 1) Search dropdown full-width on mobile, 2) Notification dropdown full-width on mobile, 3) Profile dropdown with mobile-only navigation links. Desktop layout preserved correctly.
passed_tests: Mobile (375px): Search dropdown opens full-width with 'fixed left-2 right-2' margins
Mobile (375px): Notification dropdown opens full-width with proper margins
Mobile (375px): Profile dropdown shows Friends, Leaderboard, News, Contact links with icons
Desktop (1920px): Navigation bar shows How It Works, Leaderboard, About Us, News, Contact
Desktop (1920px): Search dropdown positioned correctly with sm:w-[340px]
Desktop (1920px): Notification dropdown positioned correctly with sm:w-[360px]
All existing pages and routes still work
Responsive design working correctly - desktop nav hidden on mobile
Search functionality working on both mobile and desktop
